1IC.F.summary: Impact Coatings AB (publ) develops and commercializes physical vapor deposition (PVD) surface treatment solutions in worldwide. The company offers InlineCoater PVD equipment for fuel cell metal bipolar plates, automotive lighting reflectors, metallization on plastic and metal, and decorative coatings. It also offers MaxPhase contact coatings comprising Ceramic MaxPhase coatings for metal bipolar plates in fuel cells, as well as for connectors, antennas, and other electrical contact applications; reflector coatings for automotive industry; plastic metallization solutions for automotive and other industries, reflectors, mirrors, and electrical components; decorative PVD coatings for eyeglasses, watches, medical jewelry, automotive trim, sanitary, etc.; Silver MaxPhase PVD contact coatings for the connector and other electrical components; and Ultra MaxPhase PVD contact coatings for extreme wear, corrosion, and heat conditions. In addition, the company provides maintenance and support services. Impact Coatings AB (publ) was founded in 1997 and is based in LinkÃ¶ping, Sweden.

2GP.F.summary: Alimak Group AB (publ) designs, develops, manufactures, markets, distributes, sells, and services elevators, hoists, and work platforms. The company operates through four segments: Construction Equipment, Industrial Equipment, After Sales, and Rental. It offers industrial equipment, including elevators, maintenance units, and platforms. The company also offers construction equipment, such as construction elevators and platforms; and after sales services, including installation, technical support, maintenance, repairs, spare parts and service, refurbishment and modernization, and surveillance systems and training. In addition, it rents construction elevators and platforms. The company offers its products and services under the Alimak, Avanti, CoxGomyl, Manntech, and Alimak Service brand names to buildings and infrastructure, ports and shipyards, wind, power, oil and gas, cement, chemicals, and construction industries. The company sells its products in Europe, the Americas, the Asia Pacific, and internationally. Alimak Group AB (publ) was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

46G.F.summary: Garo Aktiebolag (publ) develops, manufactures, and markets electrical installation materials in Sweden, Norway, Finland, Poland, Ireland, and internationally. Its installation products include plugs and sockets, switches, switchboard GCS, switchboard system GPK, combination units, junction and cable boxes, aluminum enclosures, IT and meter cabinets, meter boards, consumer units, DIN rail components, multiple socket outlets, switchgear, and KNX products. The company also offers temporary power products, such as fan heaters, workplace light fixtures and fittings, distribution boards, and main and final distribution assemblies; accessories; EV chargers; and car, camping, and marina powers, as well as customized products. It serves electrical wholesalers, electrical installers, original equipment manufacturers, and industrial companies. The company also exports its products. Garo Aktiebolag (publ) was founded in 1939 and is headquartered in GnosjÃ¶, Sweden.

5TOA.F.summary: Troax Group AB (publ), through its subsidiaries, develops and supplies metal-based mesh panel solutions in the Nordic region, the United Kingdom, North America, Continental Europe, and internationally. The company offers machine guarding systems; panels and posts, such as machine guarding panels, polycarbonate panels, sheet metal panels, posts, customization panels, and surface treatment panels; stainless steel competition lines and stainless steel high lines; and accessories, such as end profiles, snappers, cut profiles, kickplates, kit PC holders, kit foam infills, gap covers, and kit extension brackets. It also provides hinged, sliding, telescopic sliding, linear sliding, automatic sliding, and automatic quick roll doors, as well as locks; anti-collapse systems that include panels and accessories; mesh shelving systems; and warehouse partitions and industrial partitions, which comprise mesh partitions, and doors and gates for vehicles, as well as accessories for the material handling and logistics applications. In addition, the company offers doors; panels; and accessories, including shelves, door system kit silences, door system holder number plates, door system trim kits, and end profiles for storage and property protection applications. Troax Group AB (publ) was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Hillerstorp, Sweden.

725.F.summary: OptiFreeze AB (publ) owns a patented technology for enhancing the taste, shape, and texture of vegetables, fruits, and berries in the freezing and thawing process. It offers OptiCept, a processing system consisting of a vacuum impregnation machine and a PEF machine with vegetables, fruits, berries, and herbs passing on a conveyor belt; and Opticap, a cartridge filled with natural additives. OptiFreeze AB (publ) was founded in 2011 and is based in Lund, Sweden.

7X9.F.summary: SaltX Technology Holding AB develops and sells patented thermochemical energy storage solution based on nano-coated salt under the SaltX brand. It serves engineering, procurement, and construction industries; original equipment manufacturers; and end customers, such as energy companies, industries, and municipalities. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Hagersten, Sweden.

AAA.ST.summary: ArcAroma AB (publ) operates as a cleantech company worldwide. It develops CEPT, a patented platform for the biological purification and hygiene of pumpable products. The company was formerly known as Arc Aroma Pure AB (publ) and changed its name to ArcAroma AB (publ) in November 2019. ArcAroma AB (publ) was founded in 2008 and is based in Lund, Sweden.

ALFA.ST.summary: Alfa Laval AB (publ) provides heat transfer, separation, and fluid handling products and solutions worldwide. The company operates in five segments: Energy, Food & Water, Marine, Greenhouse, and Operations & Other. It offers fluid handling systems, such as automation and fluid control equipment; installation materials; analytical, cleaning validation, flow, level, pressure, temperature, and weighing instruments, as well as instrumentation accessories; mixing equipment; centrifugal, circumferential piston, rotary lobe, and screw pumps; rotary jet and spray heads; tank covers and accessories; and valves. The company also provides heat transfer products, including air heat exchangers; exhaust gas economizers, and oil/gas-fired composite steam and steam boilers; burners; oil/gas-fired hot water and thermal, and waste heat recovery heaters; plate and tubular heat exchangers; and scraped surface heat exchangers. In addition, it offers separation products comprising cylindrical filter baskets and filtering elements; decanters and separators; evaporation systems; filters and strainers; and membrane and pump control systems. Further, the company provides process solutions consisting of ballast water, brewery, bulk, desalination, edible oil, exhaust gas cleaning, filling, fresh water, fuel conditioning, marine exhaust gas, olive oil, protein, refrigeration, safety, and thermal solutions. It serves the biotech and pharmaceuticals, energy, chemicals, food, dairy, beverage, home and personal care, HVAC, machinery and manufacturing, marine and transportation, mining, minerals, pigment, pulp and paper, refrigeration, semiconductor and electronics, steel, and water and waste treatment industries. The company was formerly known as AB Separator and changed its name to Alfa Laval AB (publ) in 1963. Alfa Laval AB (publ) was founded in 1883 and is headquartered in Lund, Sweden.

ALIG.ST.summary: Alimak Group AB (publ) designs, develops, manufactures, markets, distributes, sells, and services elevators, hoists, and work platforms. The company operates through four segments: Construction Equipment, Industrial Equipment, After Sales, and Rental. It offers industrial equipment, including elevators, maintenance units, and platforms. The company also offers construction equipment, such as construction elevators and platforms; and after sales services, including installation, technical support, maintenance, repairs, spare parts and service, refurbishment and modernization, and surveillance systems and training. In addition, it rents construction elevators and platforms. The company offers its products and services under the Alimak, Avanti, CoxGomyl, Manntech, and Alimak Service brand names to buildings and infrastructure, ports and shipyards, wind, power, oil and gas, cement, chemicals, and construction industries. The company sells its products in Europe, the Americas, the Asia Pacific, and internationally. Alimak Group AB (publ) was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

ATCO-A.ST.summary: Atlas Copco AB, together with its subsidiaries, provides productivity solutions. The company operates through Compressor Technique, Vacuum Technique, Industrial Technique, and Power Technique segments. It offers piston compressors, oil-free tooth and scroll compressors, rotary screw compressors, oil-free blowers, oil-free centrifugal compressors, gas and process compressors, air and gas treatment equipment, and medical air solutions primarily for use in the manufacturing and process industries. The company also provides oil-sealed rotary vane, dry, and liquid ring vacuum pumps; and turbomolecular and cryogenic pumps, as well as abatement and integrated systems for the semiconductor and scientific, chemical process, food packaging, and paper handling industries. In addition, it offers pneumatic, hydraulic, and electric assembly tools, as well as control systems and associated software for safety-critical tightening; self-pierce rivets, adhesives, and flow drill fasteners for the motor vehicle industry; self-pierce riveting tools, dispensing equipment for adhesives and sealants, and flow drill fastening equipment; and material removal tools, drills, and other pneumatic products. Further, the company provides portable compressors, boosters, generators, lighting towers, pumps, and construction and demolition tools for civil engineering, construction, and demolition applications, as well as specialty rental services. It operates in North America, South America, Europe, Africa, the Middle East, Asia, and Oceania. The company was founded in 1873 and is headquartered in Nacka, Sweden.

The company operates through Compressor Technique, Vacuum Technique, Industrial Technique, and Power Technique segments. BEIA-B.ST.summary: Beijer Alma AB (publ), together with its subsidiaries, engages in component manufacturing and industrial trading business in Sweden and internationally. It primarily offers industrial and chassis springs, as well as cables for mobile telecom and nuclear power; and cable harnesses. The company also provides wire and flat strip components; replacement springs for cars and light trucks; sport spring kits, leaf springs, and gas springs; fluid technology products comprising hoses, hose fittings, and hydraulics; rubber sheeting and seals; other industrial rubber products; fire and industrial hoses and firefighting equipment; and gaskets, seals, and plastic components. Its customers include companies in automotive, engineering, infrastructure, telecom, energy, defense, and offshore sectors. The company was formerly known as Beijer Alma Industri & Handel and changed its name to Beijer Alma AB (publ) in 1998. Beijer Alma AB (publ) was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Uppsala, Sweden.

BO6.F.summary: BoMill AB provides grain quality sorting solutions. It offers TriQ, a process capacity grain quality sorting solution; and IQ, a grain sorting solution for laboratory use. The company also provides support services, such as customer care, Trac remote access, and installation services. It serves seed cleaning, producer, elevator/terminal, malt house, and organic farming, as well as flour, semolina, and feed mill industries. The company sells quality sorting technology and know-how throughout Europe, North America, and Australia through its own sales organization or agents/distributors. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Malmo, Sweden.

BOMILL.ST.summary: BoMill AB provides grain quality sorting solutions. It offers TriQ, a process capacity grain quality sorting solution; and IQ, a grain sorting solution for laboratory use. The company also provides support services, such as customer care, Trac remote access, and installation services. It serves seed cleaning, producer, elevator/terminal, malt house, and organic farming, as well as flour, semolina, and feed mill industries. The company sells quality sorting technology and know-how throughout Europe, North America, and Australia through its own sales organization or agents/distributors. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Malmo, Sweden.

COIC.ST.summary: Concentric AB (publ), together with its subsidiaries, designs, develops, manufactures, and distributes solutions for engine and hydraulic applications in the Americas, Europe, and internationally. Its engine products include lubricant, coolant, and fuel transfer pumps for diesel engines, transmissions, and compressors, as well as oil separators to improve fuel efficiency and/or reduce emissions. The company's hydraulic products comprise gear and gerotor pumps, as well as hydraulic power packs and hybrid systems for installation in various industrial vehicles and diesel engines; and motors and systems for mobile equipment. Its products are used in trucks, industrial applications, construction equipment, and agricultural machinery markets. The company was founded in 1921 and is headquartered in LinkÃ¶ping, Sweden.

DRC.F.summary: Duroc AB (publ), through its subsidiaries, engages in the fiber, industrial trade, and other businesses in Sweden, Europe, and the United States. The company manufactures polypropylene-based fibers and yarns for the automotive, construction, furniture, and filter industries; and textiles for greenhouses. It also distributes diesel engines for industrial and marine uses, as well as provides related spare parts, service, repairs, and others; and trades in machine tools, including automation solutions, tools, service, and support for engineering companies. Further, the company engages in the maintenance of railway wheels for locomotives and railway wagons to rail operators; and renovation and manufacturing of industrial components based on laser surface treatment technology for power, mining, steel, paper/pulp, offshore, aerospace, and engineering industries. Duroc AB (publ) was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Danderyd, Sweden.

DURC-B.ST.summary: Duroc AB (publ), through its subsidiaries, engages in the fiber, industrial trade, and other businesses in Sweden, Europe, and the United States. The company manufactures polypropylene-based fibers and yarns for the automotive, construction, furniture, and filter industries; and textiles for greenhouses. It also distributes diesel engines for industrial and marine uses, as well as provides related spare parts, service, repairs, and others; and trades in machine tools, including automation solutions, tools, service, and support for engineering companies. Further, the company engages in the maintenance of railway wheels for locomotives and railway wagons to rail operators; and renovation and manufacturing of industrial components based on laser surface treatment technology for power, mining, steel, paper/pulp, offshore, aerospace, and engineering industries. Duroc AB (publ) was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Danderyd, Sweden.

FLEXQ.ST.summary: FlexQube AB (publ) provides flexible and robust industrial carts for material handling in Europe and North America. It offers carts, such as pallet and container, shelf, flow, hanging, mother-daughter, and kit carts and specialized solutions, as well as parts comprising standard building blocks, casters, fasteners/hardware, handle bars, tow bar components, attachments, shelves, tools, springs, pallet guides, rollers, and pallet changing system components. The company also provides eQart, a smart and motorized cart. Its customers include manufacturers of commercial vehicles, cars, civil engineering and industrial machinery, wind turbines and other energy related products, defense and medical equipment, and appliances and electronics; goods storage and distribution customers; and subcontractors to the automobile industry. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.

GARO.ST.summary: Garo Aktiebolag (publ) develops, manufactures, and markets electrical installation materials in Sweden, Norway, Finland, Poland, Ireland, and internationally. Its installation products include plugs and sockets, switches, switchboard GCS, switchboard system GPK, combination units, junction and cable boxes, aluminum enclosures, IT and meter cabinets, meter boards, consumer units, DIN rail components, multiple socket outlets, switchgear, and KNX products. The company also offers temporary power products, such as fan heaters, workplace light fixtures and fittings, distribution boards, and main and final distribution assemblies; accessories; EV chargers; and car, camping, and marina powers, as well as customized products. It serves electrical wholesalers, electrical installers, original equipment manufacturers, and industrial companies. The company also exports its products. Garo Aktiebolag (publ) was founded in 1939 and is headquartered in GnosjÃ¶, Sweden.

IMPC.ST.summary: Impact Coatings AB (publ) develops and commercializes physical vapor deposition (PVD) surface treatment solutions in worldwide. The company offers InlineCoater PVD equipment for fuel cell metal bipolar plates, automotive lighting reflectors, metallization on plastic and metal, and decorative coatings. It also offers MaxPhase contact coatings comprising Ceramic MaxPhase coatings for metal bipolar plates in fuel cells, as well as for connectors, antennas, and other electrical contact applications; reflector coatings for automotive industry; plastic metallization solutions for automotive and other industries, reflectors, mirrors, and electrical components; decorative PVD coatings for eyeglasses, watches, medical jewelry, automotive trim, sanitary, etc.; Silver MaxPhase PVD contact coatings for the connector and other electrical components; and Ultra MaxPhase PVD contact coatings for extreme wear, corrosion, and heat conditions. In addition, the company provides maintenance and support services. Impact Coatings AB (publ) was founded in 1997 and is based in LinkÃ¶ping, Sweden.

IVISYS.ST.summary: Ivisys AB (publ) develops and sells machine vision inspection systems. Its systems provide solutions for quality inspection, verification, and machine guidance. The company's products include IVISYS Pro F, IVISYS Pro V, IVISYS Pro M, IVISYS advanced conveyor inspection station, and IVISYS Pro User Interface, as well as other solutions. The company is based in Lomma, Sweden.

MANTEX.ST.summary: Mantex AB (publ) manufactures and sells industrial X-ray scanners for bioenergy, pulp and paper, research, and other applications in Sweden and internationally. It offers biofuel analyzers that assess the quality of wood-based biofuels and flow scanners to scan wood chips for pulp and paper production. The company was found in 1987 and is based in Kista, Sweden.

NMAN.ST.summary: Nederman Holding AB (publ) operates as an environmental technology company in North and South America, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, Asia, and Oceania. It offers industrial air filtration products for heavy process industries, including metal fabrication, power generation, mineral processing, chemical, and other industries, as well as for metal fabrication, fiber-based production, process industry operations, and auto industry aftermarket sectors. The company also provides air filtration products, such as gas turbine inlet air filtration systems, and filters and related media products for the power generation and textile industries under the Nederman Pneumafil brand. In addition, it offers metal chip processing and ash handling systems to metal machining plants, metal recyclers, solid fuel fired power plants, and others under the Nederman National Conveyors brand name; and products and solutions for handling oil mist generated during metal machining. Further, the company provides technologies for evaporation, drying, and filtration of liquids; and extrusion, spheronization, feeding, and pelleting in the chemical industry under the LCI brand name. Additionally, it also supplies gas and dust analyzers for industries; and provides particulate monitors and intelligent controls for filtration systems and related material flow processes. The company also designs and engineers of components and systems, as well as manufactures, assembles, installs, and after sales services; and develops, manufactures, and markets solutions for monitoring industrial emissions and portable instruments. The company sells its products through own sales organization, agents or resellers. Nederman Holding AB (publ) was founded in 1944 and is headquartered in Helsingborg, Sweden.

OEA.F.summary: OEM International AB (publ), together with its subsidiaries, trades in industrial components and systems. The company offers a range of industrial automation components in the areas of electrical components, machinery components and cables, pressure and flow components, motors, transmissions and brakes, appliance components, installation components, and ball bearing solutions and seals. It serves machinery and appliance manufacturing industries, wholesalers and retailers, electrical contractors, catalogue distributors, strategic end users and electronics manufacturers, and strategic contract manufacturers, as well as installation companies. The company sells its products in Sweden, Finland, the Baltic States, China, Denmark, Norway, the United Kingdom, and East Central Europe. OEM International AB (publ) is headquartered in TranÃ¥s, Sweden.

OEM-B.ST.summary: OEM International AB (publ), together with its subsidiaries, trades in industrial components and systems. The company offers a range of industrial automation components in the areas of electrical components, machinery components and cables, pressure and flow components, motors, transmissions and brakes, appliance components, installation components, and ball bearing solutions and seals. It serves machinery and appliance manufacturing industries, wholesalers and retailers, electrical contractors, catalogue distributors, strategic end users and electronics manufacturers, and strategic contract manufacturers, as well as installation companies. The company sells its products in Sweden, Finland, the Baltic States, China, Denmark, Norway, the United Kingdom, and East Central Europe. OEM International AB (publ) is headquartered in TranÃ¥s, Sweden.

OPTI.ST.summary: OptiFreeze AB (publ) owns a patented technology for enhancing the taste, shape, and texture of vegetables, fruits, and berries in the freezing and thawing process. It offers OptiCept, a processing system consisting of a vacuum impregnation machine and a PEF machine with vegetables, fruits, berries, and herbs passing on a conveyor belt; and Opticap, a cartridge filled with natural additives. OptiFreeze AB (publ) was founded in 2011 and is based in Lund, Sweden.

OPTZF.summary: OptiFreeze AB (publ) owns a patented technology for enhancing the taste, shape, and texture of vegetables, fruits, and berries in the freezing and thawing process. It offers OptiCept, a processing system consisting of a vacuum impregnation machine and a PEF machine with vegetables, fruits, berries, and herbs passing on a conveyor belt; and Opticap, a cartridge filled with natural additives. OptiFreeze AB (publ) was founded in 2011 and is based in Lund, Sweden.

R06.SG.summary: Swedish Stirling AB (publ), a clean technology company, develops and manufactures stirling engines in Sweden and internationally. The company offers various technology solutions enabling power generation that convert thermal energy to electricity. It provides PWR BLOK 400-F, a container-based solution, which converts industrial residual and flare gases in to electrical energy. The company was formerly known as Ripasso Energy AB (publ) and changed its name to Swedish Stirling AB (publ) in May 2019. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.

SALT-B.ST.summary: SaltX Technology Holding AB develops and sells patented thermochemical energy storage solution based on nano-coated salt under the SaltX brand. It serves engineering, procurement, and construction industries; original equipment manufacturers; and end customers, such as energy companies, industries, and municipalities. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Hagersten, Sweden.

SAND.ST.summary: Sandvik AB (publ) operates as an engineering company in the areas of mining and rock excavation, metal cutting, and materials technology worldwide. The company offers metal-cutting tools and tooling systems, including boring, drilling, milling, reaming, and turning tools, as well as tailor made tools and inserts, and tooling systems. It also provides mining and rock excavation equipment and tools, such as stationary and mobile crushers and screens, underground drill rigs and bolters, surface drill rigs, exploration drill rigs and tools, underground loaders and trucks, mechanical cutting equipment, rock tools and drills, mining automation systems, and parts and services, as well as breakers, demolition tools, and booms. In addition, the company offers stainless steels, special alloys, and titanium products comprising bar and hollow bars, billets and blooms, controlled expansion alloy products, hot isostatic pressed products, metal powders, plates and sheets, strip steels, and wire products, as well as tubes, pipes, fittings, and flanges; and technical services related to stainless steels and special alloys. Further, it offers advisory services for the additive manufacturing, additive manufacturing services, and powders for additive manufacturing; and diffusion furnaces, and furnace products and heating materials. The company serves aerospace, automotive, construction, general engineering, mining, nuclear power generation, oil and gas, process, and renewable energy industries. Sandvik AB (publ) was founded in 1862 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

The company offers metal-cutting tools and tooling systems, including boring, drilling, milling, reaming, and turning tools, as well as tailor made tools and inserts, and tooling systems. It also provides mining and rock excavation equipment and tools, such as stationary and mobile crushers and screens, underground drill rigs and bolters, surface drill rigs, exploration drill rigs and tools, underground loaders and trucks, mechanical cutting equipment, rock tools and drills, mining automation systems, and parts and services, as well as breakers, demolition tools, and booms. Sandvik AB (publ) was founded in 1862 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

SINT.ST.summary: SinterCast AB (publ) provides process control technology and solutions for the production of compacted graphite iron (CGI) to foundry and automotive industries worldwide. It offers fully automated System 4000, which comprises a series of individual hardware modules that could be configured to suit the layout, process flow, and production volume of a foundry for ladle production and pouring furnaces; and provides hardware and software platform that allows the foundries to independently control CGI series production and product development. The company also provides Mini-System 4000, a purpose-built thermal analysis system for product development, prototyping, and niche volume production. In addition, it offers sampling consumables that consists of Sampling Cup and the Thermocouple Pair products; and engineering services for product development, trials, new installations and calibrations, metallurgical consultancy, and ongoing customer services. Further, the company provides SinterCast Ladle Tracker, SinterCast Cast Tracker, and SinterCast Operator Tracker for traceability and process optimization in foundries and other metallurgical facilities. Additionally, it offers System 4000, a fourth generation process control technology; and System 4000 plus for automated base treatment, as well as provides technical support services. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

STRLNG.ST.summary: Swedish Stirling AB (publ), a clean technology company, develops and manufactures stirling engines in Sweden and internationally. The company offers various technology solutions enabling power generation that convert thermal energy to electricity. It provides PWR BLOK 400-F, a container-based solution, which converts industrial residual and flare gases in to electrical energy. The company was formerly known as Ripasso Energy AB (publ) and changed its name to Swedish Stirling AB (publ) in May 2019. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.

STW.ST.summary: SeaTwirl AB (publ) develops and sells floating wind turbines. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Gothenburg, Sweden.

TLLB.F.summary: Trelleborg AB (publ) develops, manufactures, and sells engineered polymer solutions for seal, damp, and protect applications worldwide. The company offers anti-vibration solutions, including anti-vibration and suspension products, as well as buffers and pads; boots for transmission, steering gear, and shock absorption applications; shims/insulators, tuned absorbers, applied damping material, noise damping materials in brakes, and noise and vibration damping solutions; and bearings and bushings. It also provides engineered coated fabrics; molded rubber products and custom rubber parts; marine fenders, ship-shore link, ship performance monitoring, docking and mooring, navigation and piloting, and surface buoyancy products, as well as LNG custody transfer, and after-sales and support services for port owners and operators, and consulting engineers; and float over solutions. In addition, the company offers industrial hoses and hose assemblies, oil and marine hoses, expansion joints, and couplings and accessories; anti-vibration mounts, fenders, profiles, and hydraulic hoses; and rubber sheeting and mining equipment. Further, it provides custom shapes, tubing and hose, combination, medical seal and bearings, finished medical devices, and advanced composite products for healthcare and medical applications; offshore solutions for the subsea, topside, drilling, surface, seismic, and renewables applications; pipe sealing solutions and repair services; printing solutions for polymer-coated fabrics, as well as rollers and belts for tissue and textile applications; and sealing profiles solutions. Additionally, the company offers sealing solutions; tunnel seals; rubber wear liners; tires and complete wheels for agricultural and forestry machines, material handling, construction vehicles, and others; other solutions; and forklift tire and wheel services. Trelleborg AB (publ) was founded in 1905 and is headquartered in Trelleborg, Sweden.

TREL-B.ST.summary: Trelleborg AB (publ) develops, manufactures, and sells engineered polymer solutions for seal, damp, and protect applications worldwide. TROAX.ST.summary: Troax Group AB (publ), through its subsidiaries, develops and supplies metal-based mesh panel solutions in the Nordic region, the United Kingdom, North America, Continental Europe, and internationally. The company offers machine guarding systems; panels and posts, such as machine guarding panels, polycarbonate panels, sheet metal panels, posts, customization panels, and surface treatment panels; stainless steel competition lines and stainless steel high lines; and accessories, such as end profiles, snappers, cut profiles, kickplates, kit PC holders, kit foam infills, gap covers, and kit extension brackets. It also provides hinged, sliding, telescopic sliding, linear sliding, automatic sliding, and automatic quick roll doors, as well as locks; anti-collapse systems that include panels and accessories; mesh shelving systems; and warehouse partitions and industrial partitions, which comprise mesh partitions, and doors and gates for vehicles, as well as accessories for the material handling and logistics applications. In addition, the company offers doors; panels; and accessories, including shelves, door system kit silences, door system holder number plates, door system trim kits, and end profiles for storage and property protection applications. Troax Group AB (publ) was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Hillerstorp, Sweden.

XANO-B.ST.summary: XANO Industri AB (publ), through its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells industrial products and automation equipment. The company operates through three segments: Industrial Products, Industrial Solutions, and Precision Technology. It offers standard injection-molded plastic components, including slide stops and glides for furniture, hand wheels, adjustable feet, levers, handles, and pipe stoppers, as well as customized solutions; boats and components for vehicles and infrastructure, as well as industrial tanks and buoyancy elements; and technical blow molded plastic components for vehicles, construction machinery, and infrastructure equipment. The company also designs, manufactures, and sells automation equipment for handling metal cans and lids; magnets for industrial use; accumulator units for the packaging industry; and conveyor systems and customer-specific solutions for use in the food handling, medical technology, bio-processes, environment, and energy sectors, as well as supplies and integrates equipment and packaging solutions. In addition, it provides machine tubes, pistons, and drill pipes for the mining industry; cylinders and piston rods for the hydraulic industry; and piston rods for the offshore industry. Further, the company offers precision components and transmission parts, such as toothed gears, splines, racks, fixtures, prototypes, tools, measuring devices, components for the aviation and defence industries, hydraulic components, spare parts, and other components; and long hole drilling, turning, milling, honing, straightening, grinding, heat treatment, and chrome plating services, as well as processes plastic materials and provides associated assembly services. It has operations in the Nordic region, Estonia, the Netherlands, Poland, China, and the United States. XANO Industri AB (publ) was founded in 1937 and is headquartered in JÃ¶nkÃ¶ping, Sweden.
